biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of checking a molecular structure before using it as an input for a Molecular Dynamics simulation, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks (biobb).

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Molecular Structure Checking
